about_the_game:
The Studio Polygon 400MMC is based on Alexander Dennis Enviro 400MMCs in the real-world. The Enviro 400MMC is a low-floor double decker introduced by Alexander Dennis in 2014. Our rendition of this includes various variants offered in the real-world, tonnes of customisability options to match and unique realistic systems to match exact behaviour found in the real bus.

Version 1.2 of the 400MMC further improves the experience of the 400MMC with a re-worked model, new customisability options, 200+ new sounds, improved texturing, and a huge improvement on performance. With these changes, it makes the 400MMC experience better than you’ve ever had before allowing you to enjoy driving a double decker round the streets of OMSI 2.


  • A whopping 23 variants - 16 ADL variants, and 7 Scania variants
  • 7 low height variants
  • 5 dual door variants
  • 1 London spec dual door variants
  • Lots of customisability options including seating options, mirror types, internal next stop displays, wheel accessories, engine stop/start and more!
  • Unique vehicle systems meticulously recreated to match real-world operation
  • High detail Hanover Displays simulation
  • Advanced Ticketer ticket machine recreated 1:1 with real-life, licensed by Ticketer themselves.
  • Immersive audio meticulously recreated from real-world counterparts
  • Custom handling scripts
  • Mirror screens option that replaces the traditional mirrors with cameras inside of the cab based off of ADL’s SmartVision technology.
  • and so much more!

The Studio Polygon 400MMC is based on Alexander Dennis Enviro 400MMCs in the real-world. The Enviro 400MMC is a low-floor double decker introduced by Alexander Dennis in 2014. Our rendition of this includes various variants offered in the real-world, tonnes of customisability options to match and unique realistic systems to match exact behaviour found in the real bus.

Version 1.2 of the 400MMC further improves the experience of the 400MMC with a re-worked model, new customisability options, 200+ new sounds, improved texturing, and a huge improvement on performance. With these changes, it makes the 400MMC experience better than you’ve ever had before allowing you to enjoy driving a double decker round the streets of OMSI 2.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: CPU with 2,8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: at least 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OMSI 2 – Der Omnibussimulator at least 2.3.001
